name: CCChipmunkCore
summary: CCChipmunkCore, ChipmunkCore A fast and lightweight 2D game physics library.
description: CCChipmunkCore, ChipmunkCore is a simple, lightweight, fast and portable 2D rigid body physics library written in C. Itâ€™s licensed under the unrestrictive, OSI approved MIT license. My aim is to give 2D developers access to the same quality of physics you find in newer 3D games. I hope you enjoy using ChipmunkCore!
